actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the George Washington Boyhood Home National Historic Site in the State of Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the George Washington Boyhood Home National Historic Site in Virginia. Authorizes the appropriation of sums to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the George Washington Boyhood Home National Historic Site in the State of Virginia.
